ExpSyntax.val: StrBuild(MlsTrans('Indirect kosten berekening voor portefeuille met PPR-Id @1@ is afgerond !'), Trim(Str({0,603979778},'')))

SQL_STMT_U.val: select s.code, s.amount, decode(nvl(vk2.vbp_rubriek_nr, 0), 0, vk1.vbp_rubriek_nr, vk2.vbp_rubriek_nr) subAsset, decode(nvl(vk2.vbp_rubriek_nr, 0), 0, decode(nvl(vk1.vbp_percentage, 0), 0, 100, vk1.vbp_percentage), vk2.vbp_percentage) part, bi.be_symbool, bi.be_optietype, bi.be_expiratiedatum, bi.be_exerciseprijs from (select sum(a.amount*a.factor) amount, c.code code , b.instrument_id from pc_portfolio_amount a inner join pc_category c on c.id = a.pcca_id inner join pc_portfolio_base b on b.id = a.pcpb_id inner join performance_report r on r.id =b.pere_id where r.ppr_id = ~1 and b.calc_date between ~2 and ~3 group by c.code, b.instrument_id) s inner join beleggingsinstrument bi on bi.be_volgnummer = s.instrument_id left outer join vb_verm_rubriek_koppeling vk1 on vk1.vbp_groep_nr = ~4 and vk1.vbp_bi_type = bi.be_bi_nummer left outer join vb_verm_rubriek_koppeling vk2 on vk2.vbp_groep_nr = ~4 and vk2.vbp_fondssymbool = bi.be_symbool and vk2.vbp_optietype = bi.be_optietype and vk2.vbp_expiratiedatum = bi.be_expiratiedatum and vk2.vbp_exerciseprijs = bi.be_exerciseprijs

select s.code, s.amount, nvl(m.inas_sac_id,0) subAsset, nvl(m.inas_percentage, 0) part, bi.be_symbool, bi.be_optietype, bi.be_expiratiedatum, bi.be_exerciseprijs from (select sum(a.amount*a.factor) amount, c.code code , b.instrument_id from pc_portfolio_amount a inner join pc_category c on c.id = a.pcca_id inner join pc_portfolio_base b on b.id = a.pcpb_id inner join performance_report r on r.id =b.pere_id where r.ppr_id = ~1 and b.calc_date between ~2 and ~3 group by c.code, b.instrument_id) s inner join beleggingsinstrument bi on bi.be_volgnummer = s.instrument_id left outer join instrument_assetmix m on m.inas_be_id=s.instrument_id
